title: In-Game Lag without changes in MS
body:
Roughly a week ago I started to encounter a problem with my League of Legends, but the cause of it is unclear. The problem has the symptoms of slight lag (Delays on champion commands, moments of "walking in place" for everything on screen followed by very fast "catching up") but without any sort of MS changes. 
The issue has occurred regardless of whether or not I have other programs or pages (Discord, Skype, YouTube, etc) running in the background, and it's not incredibly consistent. I haven't found any trend in when the issue appears, such as when abilities are being cast, or during large teamfights, and by this point I don't know what the root of the issue is.
I play League with 5+ other people, and none of them have encountered the same issue, so I've got no one else to compare to at the moment, to see if maybe there's some consistencies between myself and them.

replies.body:
The issues you described in this post are really common symptoms of *Packet Loss* or High packet buffering. This is often caused by an issue along your network route or conflicting network settings. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any sort of change.
Is it you're champion that lags, or all champions?  Because I have an issue where just my champion is lagging
Im also having the problem where just MY champion is lagging.
I'm not sure about other champions, but I think they do as well. I know that tower shots and minions all lag with me when it happens, though.
